title: SolrCloud solr.xml parameters are not persisted by CoreContainer.
description: Parameters like solr/@zkHost and solr/cores/@hostPort are ignored.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
Here is a first pass on this.

Honestly, the way persistence is tested needs improvement. Should be a better test, better name, better location. I'm not getting into that at the moment though. Just building on what's there for this fix.
